content.rendered:
Individual Therapy for Adults

Our work together will be customized to meet your specific needs and goals. Whether you are struggling with anxiety, stress, relationship problems, or managing difficult life changes, I will help you recognize underlying problems, fully realize your strengths and adjust certain behaviors and thoughts to see things a different, healthier way. Individual sessions are available online or at my St. Petersburg location.

Specialties include:

  • Anxiety
  • Stress Management
  • Coping with Difficult Life Challenges and Transitions
  • Young Adults
  • College and Graduate Students
  • ADHD

Additional difficulties I can help with:

  • Adjustment Disorders
  • Self-esteem issues
  • Academic Issues
  • Perfectionism
  • Self-compassion
  • Women’s Issues
  • Issues in the Workplace
  • Assertiveness

If your specific concern is not listed, don’t hesitate to contact me for a complimentary consultation. If I am not the best fit to work with you, I will provide recommendations to find a therapist to best assist you.

As a psychologist, I will:

  • Provide a confidential, comfortable, and non-judgmental space for you to express your concerns
  • Share honest and kind feedback to assist you in seeing situations from alternative perspectives
  • Work collaboratively with you to set goals towards improvements that are reasonable and make sense in your life
  • Teach skills and techniques to help you better cope with stress and difficult situations

Clients I have worked with have reported improvements in:

  • Confidence
  • Relationship Satisfaction
  • Work/Life Balance
  • Self-Compassion
  • Self-Care
  • Anxiety and Stress Management
  • Comfort and acceptance of emotions

To help my clients be their best selves, I use an integrated approach towards treatment with evidence-based treatments including:

  • Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
  • Positive Psychology
  • Acceptance and Commitment Therapy

If you’d like to learn more about how therapy may be helpful for your concerns, call now for a complimentary consultation! During this phone call, we’ll discuss what concerns you’re having and you’ll have an opportunity to ask me any questions. Together we’ll decide if working together would be a good fit. If we decide to move forward – we can schedule our first appointment! If I feel your needs may be better met by a different type of therapist or therapy in-person I will assist you in finding a referral.

Schedule a complimentary consultation now!

jetpack-related-posts.title: FAQs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: I’m used to handling things on my own. Does seeing a therapist make me seem weak? No! Everyone needs help or support now and then. In fact, I think it takes courage to ask for help. You already have strengths that you’ve used before, but for whatever reason may struggle…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Home
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome! Do you find yourself frequently worried or anxious? Are you going through a big change (i.e. a break-up, divorce, new job, loss) that is causing increased stress or uncomfortable emotions? Life can be so difficult at times. Even the strongest people need a little bit of help to work…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Mental Health Links
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The following links are listed to provide you with additional online mental health care information. Please also check the additional links provided for physical health for a more comprehensive understanding of your overall well-being. The following is not meant to be a comprehensive list, nor is it an endorsement of the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Online Therapy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: My individual therapy services are also available online for Florida residents. Online therapy is convenient, effective, and confidential. I meet with my clients on a secure and HIPAA compliant platform (which feels similar to Skype or FaceTime). If you are comfortable with technology, have a good internet connection and a…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Fees
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Rates $230 Initial Intake 60 minutes $180 Individual Therapy Session 50 minutes Insurance I am not paneled with insurance companies and am considered an out-of-network provider. If your insurance company provides out-of-network reimbursement,  I can provide a detailed receipt each month. You can submit this to your insurance company if…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Contact
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Please use the form on this page to send a message. You may also contact me by phone. Please know that contacting me does not establish a therapeutic relationship.
